docs.text:
TINZ


This TINZ is an open source FPGA and CPU development board. It was born out of 
the dislike of the ZYBO board's development process, and the discovery of 

Project IceStorm
. With Project IceStorm we 
saw a way of developing that didn't involve huge convoluted IDEs, but rather 
simple command line utilities and whatever text editor you wanted. 


TINZ = TINZ Is Not ZYBO.
docs.title: Home

docs.text:
This TINZ is an open source FPGA and CPU development board. It was born out of 
the dislike of the ZYBO board's development process, and the discovery of  Project IceStorm . With Project IceStorm we 
saw a way of developing that didn't involve huge convoluted IDEs, but rather 
simple command line utilities and whatever text editor you wanted.   TINZ = TINZ Is Not ZYBO.

docs.text:
The Board


Block Diagram


Below is a general block diagram of the board, and how data flows.


 


Schematic


The schematic of the board is available on 

GitHub
. The schematic exists in the 
board directory. Just open the tinz.sch in Eagle to view the schematic. The 
board layout is there as well.
